job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement, and maintain a scalable, high-throughput back-end traffic and usage monitoring and analysis system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software engineering tasks focused on building and maintaining a system, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to ensuring the high availability and reliability of DeepL's service even in the event of attacks
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring high availability and reliability are core software engineering responsibilities related to system robustness and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate automatic blocking of malicious clients into all backend services
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating a specific functionality (blocking malicious clients) into existing backend services, which is a software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Incorporate advanced bot detection and fraud prevention technologies
job_tasks.justification: While the technologies might be AI-related, the task described is about incorporating them into the system, which is a software development and integration activity.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly relates to the ability to communicate openly and provide feedback, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration and feedback, aligning with the definition of communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: trust in your productivity, all in sync with your team's general locations and time zones to foster effective and seamless collaboration.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of collaboration and working effectively with a distributed team.

soft_skills.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on continuous learning and professional development directly maps to the Learning & Adaptability category.

soft_skills.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
soft_skills.justification: Hack Fridays and valuing initiatives, impact, and creativity point towards innovation and taking ownership of projects.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on backend software engineering tasks related to traffic monitoring, usage management, and security interventions. While it mentions 'advanced bot detection and fraud prevention technologies', the core responsibilities and the tech stack (C#, ASP.NET Core, Kubernetes, Kafka, PostgreSQL) are indicative of a traditional software engineering role. There are no explicit mentions of developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, or related GenAI-specific tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities and the technology stack. The tasks described are all within the realm of traditional software engineering, with no indication of AI/ML model development or integration beyond using existing technologies for security purposes. This clarity makes the classification straightforward.
